Test Name: Primary Membranous Nephropathy Diagnostic Cascade, Serum
Purpose: To detect anti-PLA2R and anti-THSD7A antibodies in serum for the diagnosis of primary membranous nephropathy.
Equipment: ELISA kits (anti-PLA2R and anti-THSD7A) and microplate reader capable of 450 nm absorbance with 620-650 nm reference
